rdf:Description.dc:title: A review of analytical methods for bitumens and heavy oils 1988
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Pickard, Andrew.
Wallace, D.
Alberta Committee on Oil Sands Analysis.
Alberta Oil Sands Technology and Research Authority.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Oil Sands Technology and Research Authority,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "The Alberta Committee on Oil Sands Analysis, Edmonton, Alta. Canada"
Collection of studies attempting to establish the limitations of the numerous methods for analyzing bitumen and heavy oil.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Bitumen
Oil sands
